text: Kim Kardashian is making 2018 a yr to recollect. At present, the Holding Up With the Kardashians star will obtain the first - ever Influencer Award on the Council of Style Designers of America Style Awards, held in New York Metropolis. Though previous honorees of the annual ceremony have been restricted to designers ( except the Icon Award, which Rihanna and Beyoncé have acquired in current years ), the brand new class demonstrates the style trade ’ s recognition of the worth of social media. And, Kim ’ s fashion prowess and relationships with designers are a testomony to that worth.
